mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (productCode, cartDate, cartRemoved, optionCode) VALUES (#{productCode}, NOW(), 0, #{optionCode})
mapper.select: SELECT cartId, productCode, cartDate, optionCode, COUNT(optionCode) AS quantity FROM cart WHERE cartRemoved = 0 GROUP BY productCode, optionCode ORDER BY cartDate ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE productCode = #{productCode} AND optionCode = #{optionCode} ORDER BY cartId LIMIT 1
